Text: Quick Update Sorry we did not catch up when I was in Houston in December At the time I was in the process of leaving the company I helped to start and have joined a sports marketing agency to build their international business At some point I would be interested in speaking with you about some projects domestic and international that were working on One of our business groups specialize in the stadiumproperties naming rights field and there are some great opportunities including the new Pittsburgh Steelers stadium I thought one of your companies or possibly New Power might have an interest in taking a look at it Let me know when you have a free moment Cheers BA Bruce Angus Millsport International Washington Blvd F Stamford CT P F Email
